text: The United States Secretary of Agriculture is the head of the United States Department of Agriculture. The position carries similar responsibilities to agriculture ministers of other governments. ==Secretaries of Agriculture== The following is a list of Secretaries of Agriculture, since the creation of the office in 1889.
